summary: The story of student-soldiers trying to protect a middle school during the early days of the Korean War.
cast: Seung-Won Cha|Sang-Woo Kwon|Seung-Hyun Choi|Seung-woo Kim|Hye-seong Kim|Seong-hwan Koo|Hyun-tak Shin|Jae-won Moon|Dong-beom Kim|Yoon-Seong Kim|Tu-in Tak|Seung-Hoon Yoon|Howon Kim|Han-joon Kim|Won-hee Cho|Kyung-deok Ra|Jun-yeong Hwang|Tae-Hwan Kim|Seung-geun Lee|Seo-hyeong Kim|Yeong-jin Park|Han-bo Kim|Kyung-Sun Shin|Han Kim|Min Choi|Tae-boo Nam|Jin-hee Park|Sung-ryung Kim|Hye-sung Kim|Choe Min|Jin-woo Song
title: Pohwasogeuro
